attributes.action: Investigate the serious time delays it takes to the S.I.A(Security Industry Authority) to approve a man or woman there licence to work either new application or renewal
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Investigate the serious time delays it takes to the S.I.A(Security Industry Authority) to approve a man or woman there licence to work either new application or renewal."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page15857.asp

Prime Minister's Office
